messages.message: *[Engineering]* -- Please make sure your backports to 24.28 or 24.07 are merged into master first. We are working on some potential changes on these release branches. If you have any backport PR that's somehow not in master (and also not in any local branch so you don't have any backup), please let your manager know and post in <#C035SLYCJ9X|> before 9am PST tomorrow (Thu July 11). Thanks cc <!subteam^S038TM462UX>
Sending out an email with the same announcement
Just to confirm, this is only for 24.28/24.07, not for older release branches?

@lydia that's correct! assuming there aren't any unexpected blockers, we're planning on deleting the branches that were cut this past monday, and re-cutting after getting the all clear (so branches that were cut prior to this monday will not be impacted)
Yeah this announcement is really just precaution, because all backports should ideally be in master first
